resources.string: This application gathers your touch data while you play the following game. The data is anonymous and only used for research purposes. Data is not gathered outside of this application. Please click below to accept and continue.

This application gathers your touch data for research purposes while you play the following game. The target of the research is to analyse touch interaction data, in order to establish whether the data can be applied to identify generalised properties which differentiate a certain group of users from other groups. All data is anonymous.
For data labelling purposes, please indicate your gender
For data labelling purposes, please indicate your primary handedness
